title: ePortfolio Design and Reflective Practice Workshop for Higher Education Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency (Smartphone App Utilization)
context.additional_context: ePortfolio system-building competency enhancement for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to systematically document and reflect on work performance

learning_goals: Learners can build an e-portfolio via smartphone within a week and upload 3+ key work achievements
Learners apply a reflective practice framework to write reflective descriptions of 150+ characters for portfolio entries
Learners revise/improve portfolio content at least once based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
